conclusion: Analyze the motion of the particle based on the given graph.
Graph shows displacement x in meters against time t in seconds.
Particle starts at x = 10 m at t = 0 and decreases over time.
Particle moves downward from x = 10 m to x = 0 m over the time interval from 0 to 4 seconds.
Speed is the rate of change of displacement with respect to time, given by the slope of the tangent line at each point.
Locate the points where the speed is 5 m/s; tangent line at each point will have a slope equal to the speed.
Since the particle moves downward, the speed is negative.
Tangent line will be downward, indicating that the speed is decreasing over time.
